room_title: Escape room "Kingdom Quest: Save the Realm!" by Escape Adventures in Baltimore
room_description: Hear ye, hear ye! Our king - the honorable Simon the IV - had declared a state of emergency! A dragon attack is imminent! In exactly one hour, the terrible serpent known as Vermithrax Pejorative will lay waste to the realm! Since the king's knights are busy with defenses against the dragon, he has sent out an open plea to would-be heroes far and wide to come to the castle to aid the creatures of the forest and save the realm!
